Hello.
I'm not a registered Gladiator member, nor have I been part of the 
project for a long time. I've played Gladiator for a long long time 
and enjoyed it throughly, then downloaded OpenGlad, and rejoiced. I 
found this Yahoo! Group by chance, and saw a message about a IRC Chat 
Channel. I am having one set up on irc.gamesnet.net, channel #FSGames.
I'm part of a seperate gaming project and figured I could help y'all 
out in small ways. I can even host a website if you'd like.

Cheers.

-duke
